name: 楊恆隆
objective: 本課程的目的是為了：1.驗證物理理論之真實性，2.培養同學認真的科學態度與方法，3.培養同學數據處理的能力，4.啟發同學自行設計解決量度問題的方法。課程之施行分為上下兩學期，每一學期為一學分三小時。上學期的內容偏重力學、波動、熱力、流力之實驗，下學期的內容則偏重電磁、光學、近物之實驗。
schedule:
1	2/17~2/23	Preparation week
2	2/24~3/1	Exp. How to use a multimeter and Ohm’s Law（additional papers）
3	3/2~3/8	Exp.25 Mapping of Electric Fields(P.185)  &
Exp.27 Method of Measureing Resistance(P.197)
4	3/9~3/15	Exp.32 A Study of Capacitance and Capacitor Transients(P.229)
5	3/16~3/22	Exp.31 Circuits Containing More Than One Potential Source (P.223)
6	3/23~3/29	Exp.39 The Focal Length of a Concave Mirror(P.283)
7	3/30~4/5	Exp. Electric Charge to Mass Ratio（additional papers）
8	4/6~4/12	Exp.38 Reflection and Refractuon of Light(P.275)
9	4/13~4/19	midterm examination   
10	4/20~4/26	Exp.40 Properties of Converging and Diverging Lenses(P.289)
11	4/27~5/3	Exp.34 Measurement of the Earth’s Magnetic Field(P.245)
12	5/4~5/10	Exp.36 The Oscilloscope(P.257)
13	5/11~5/17	Exp.42 The Laser(P.303)  &
Exp.45 A Study of Spectra with the Grating Spectrometer(P.321)  &
Exp.46 Polarized Light(P.327)
14	5/18~5/24	Exp.33 A study of Magnetic Field(P.237)
15	5/25~5/31	Exp. Photoelectric effect（additional papers）
16	6/1~6/7	audio-visual instruction
17	6/8~6/14	final examination
scorePolicy:
(1) Lab Reports
(2) Class performance 
(3) Others by TA
